fields.name: AdministratorLoginPassword
fields.description: The password of the administrator login. Each cluster is created with pre-defined administrative role called ‘citus’.

fields.name: CitusVersion
fields.description: The Citus extension version on all cluster servers.

fields.name: CoordinatorEnablePublicIPAccess
fields.description: If public access is enabled on coordinator.

fields.name: CoordinatorServerEdition
fields.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose).

fields.name: CoordinatorStorageQuotaInMb
fields.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB.

fields.name: CoordinatorVCores
fields.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 96).

fields.name: EnableHa
fields.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the cluster.

fields.name: EnableShardsOnCoordinator
fields.description: If distributed tables are placed on coordinator or not. Should be set to 'true' on single node clusters. Requires shard rebalancing after value is changed.

fields.name: NodeCount
fields.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a single node configuration with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. 2 or more worker nodes represent multi-node configuration. Node count value cannot be 1.

fields.name: NodeEnablePublicIPAccess
fields.description: If public access is enabled on worker nodes.

fields.name: NodeServerEdition
fields.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

fields.name: NodeStorageQuotaInMb
fields.description: The storage in MB on each worker node.

fields.name: NodeVCores
fields.description: The compute in vCores on each worker node (max: 104).

fields.name: PostgresqlVersion
fields.description: The major PostgreSQL version on all cluster servers.

fields.name: PreferredPrimaryZone
fields.description: Preferred primary availability zone (AZ) for all cluster servers.
